titleStmt.title: An Aprill shower shed in abundance of teares, for the death and incomparable losse, of the right noble, truly religious, and virtuous, Richard Sacuile, Baron of Buckhurst, and Earle of Dorset. VVho departed this life vpon Easter day last, being the 28.th of March, at Dorset-House. By Henry Peacham.
titleStmt.author: Peacham, Henry, 1576?-1643?

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Vpon the death of the Earle of Dorset.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
